briefdescription.para: GLIB Base error code.
Successful call.
Function did not draw.
Invalid char.
Coordinates out of bounds.
Invalid coordinates (ex.
Invalid argument.
Out of memory.
File not supported.
General IO Error.
Invalid file.
Driver not initialized correctly.
Initialization function for the glib.

simplesect.para: Returns GLIB_OK on success, or else error code

briefdescription.para: Clears the display with the background color of the glib_context_t.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a GLIB_Context_t which holds the background color.

simplesect.para: Returns GLIB_OK on success, or else error code

briefdescription.para: Draws a pixel at x, y using foregroundColor defined in the glib_context_t.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a glib_context_t which holds the foreground color.

simplesect.para: Returns GLIB_OK on success, or else error code

briefdescription.para: Earse a pixel at x, y using foregroundColor defined in the glib_context_t.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a glib_context_t which holds the foreground color.

simplesect.para: Returns GLIB_OK on success, or else error code

memberdef.argsstring: (glib_context_t *pContext, char my_char, int32_t x, int32_t y)
memberdef.name: glib_draw_char

briefdescription.para: Draws a char using the font supplied with the library.

parameterdescription.para: Start x-coordinate for the char (Upper left corner)
Start y-coordinate for the char (Upper left corner)

simplesect.para: Returns GLIB_OK on success, or else error code

memberdef.argsstring: (glib_context_t *pContext, const char *str, int32_t x0, int32_t y0)
memberdef.name: glib_draw_string

briefdescription.para: Draws a string using the font supplied with the library.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the string that is drawn
Start x-coordinate for the string (Upper left corner)
Start y-coordinate for the string (Upper left corner)

simplesect.para: Returns GLIB_OK on success, or else error code

briefdescription.para: Set new font for the library.

detaileddescription.para: Note that GLIB defines a default font in glib.c. Redefine GLIB_DEFAULT_FONT to change the default font.

simplesect.para: Returns GLIB_OK on success, or else error code

memberdef.argsstring: (glib_context_t *pContext, uint8_t x1, uint8_t y1, uint8_t x2, uint8_t y2)
memberdef.name: glib_draw_line

briefdescription.para: Draws a line from x1, y1 to x2, y2 by Bresenhem's algorithm.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a glib_context_t in which the line is drawn.

simplesect.para: Returns GLIB_OK on success, or else error code

memberdef.argsstring: (glib_context_t *pContext, uint8_t x1, uint8_t y1, uint8_t x2, uint8_t y2)
memberdef.name: glib_draw_rectangle

briefdescription.para: Draws a rectangle from x1, y1 to x2, y2.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a glib_context_t in which the line is drawn.

simplesect.para: Returns GLIB_OK on success, or else error code

memberdef.argsstring: (glib_context_t *pContext, uint8_t par_x, uint8_t par_y, uint8_t par_r)
memberdef.name: glib_draw_circle

briefdescription.para: Draws a circle with center at x, y, and a radius.

detaileddescription.para: Draws a circle using the Bresenhem's algorithm. See Wikipedia for algorithm.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a glib_context_t in which the circle is drawn. The circle is drawn using the foreground color.

simplesect.para: Returns GLIB_OK on success, or else error code

briefdescription.para: Update the display device with contents of active glib_frame_buffer.

simplesect.para: Returns GLIB_OK is successful, error otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Draws a bitmap.

detaileddescription.para: Sets up a bitmap that starts at 0,0 and draws bitmap. The picture is a monochrome bitmap.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a GLIB_Context_t in which the bitmap is drawn.

simplesect.para: Returns GLIB_OK on success, or else error code

briefdescription.para: Set a inversion color to glib.

simplesect.para: GLIB_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Set a normal color to glib.

simplesect.para: GLIB_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Set a contrast to glib.

parameterdescription.para: Value to set contrast. Select 1 out of 256 contrast steps. Contrast increases as the value increases.

simplesect.para: GLIB_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Set a Right Horizontal Scroll to glib.

simplesect.para: GLIB_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Set a Left Horizontal Scroll to glib.

simplesect.para: GLIB_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Set a Vertical and Right Horizontal Scroll to glib.

simplesect.para: GLIB_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Set a Vertical and Left Horizontal Scroll to glib.

simplesect.para: GLIB_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Stop scroll to glib.

simplesect.para: GLIB_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Set the display ON/OFF to glib.

simplesect.para: GLIB_OK if there are no errors.

briefdescription.para: Silicon Labs Graphics Library.

sect1.title: Evaluation Quality
sect1.para: This code has been minimally tested to ensure that it builds and is suitable as a demonstration for evaluation purposes only. This code will be maintained at the sole discretion of Silicon Labs.
